tables.name: neutron_block_events
tables.description: This table provides a detailed record of all events that occurred on the Cosmos blockchain, including block height, timestamp, and event type. It offers a comprehensive view of the blockchain's activity and evolution.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: The height of the block in the blockchain, uniquely identifying each block.

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp when the block was created on the blockchain.

columns.name: event_index
columns.description: The index of the event within the block.

columns.name: event_type
columns.description: The type of event that occurred, which can be used to categorize and analyze the data.

columns.name: event_attributes
columns.description: Additional attributes related to the event, providing more context and information.

columns.name: source
columns.description: The source of the data, indicating which blockchain or node provided the information.

columns.name: schema_version
columns.description: The version of the schema used to structure and organize the data.

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp when the data was ingested into the system.

tables.name: neutron_blocks
tables.description: This table contains information about blocks in the Cosmos blockchain ecosystem, providing insights into block heights, timestamps, and other relevant metrics.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: The height of the block in the blockchain, indicating its position in the chain.

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp when the block was created, measured in seconds since the Unix epoch.

columns.name: chain_id
columns.description: A unique identifier for the Cosmos blockchain network, distinguishing it from other networks.

columns.name: proposer_address
columns.description: The address of the validator that proposed the block for inclusion in the blockchain.

columns.name: validators_hash
columns.description: A hash of the validators that participated in the block's validation process.

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp when the block data was ingested into the system, measured in seconds since the Unix epoch.

columns.name: messages_bytes
columns.description: The total number of bytes in all the messages (transactions) included in the block.

columns.name: tx_count
columns.description: The total number of transactions (messages) included in the block.

tables.name: neutron_delegate
tables.description: This table provides a comprehensive view of transactions and actions within the Cosmos ecosystem, including block height, timestamps, and token-related activities.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: The current height of the block in the blockchain.

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp when the block was created.

columns.name: tx_hash
columns.description: A unique identifier for the transaction.

columns.name: tx_index
columns.description: The index of the transaction within the block.

columns.name: message_index
columns.description: The index of the message within the transaction.

columns.name: action_index
columns.description: The index of the action within the message.

columns.name: sender
columns.description: The address of the account that initiated the transaction.

columns.name: validator
columns.description: The validator responsible for processing the transaction.

columns.name: token_amount
columns.description: The amount of tokens transferred or exchanged.

columns.name: token_denom
columns.description: The denomination of the token (e.g., ATOM, UST).

columns.name: new_shares
columns.description: The newly minted or exchanged shares.

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp when the data was ingested into the system.

tables.name: neutron_dex_limit_order_cancel
tables.description: This table contains the details of transactions where a limit order was canceled on a Dex in the Cosmos ecosystem. It captures the sender and receiver of the transaction, along with the tokens involved.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: The height of the block in which the transaction was included.

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp at which the block was created.

columns.name: tx_hash
columns.description: The unique hash identifier of the transaction.

columns.name: tx_index
columns.description: The index of the transaction within the block.

columns.name: message_index
columns.description: The index of the message within the transaction.

columns.name: action_index
columns.description: The index of the action within the message.

columns.name: sender
columns.description: The account address that initiated the transaction.

columns.name: receiver
columns.description: The account address that received the transaction.

columns.name: token_denom_in
columns.description: The denomination of the token that was input into the transaction.

columns.name: token_amount_in_remaining
columns.description: The remaining amount of the input token.

columns.name: token_denom_out
columns.description: The denomination of the token that was output from the transaction.

columns.name: token_amount_out
columns.description: The amount of the output token.

columns.name: tranche_key
columns.description: A unique identifier for a specific investment product.

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp at which the data was ingested into the system.

tables.name: neutron_dex_limit_order_place
tables.description: This table provides information on limit orders placed on Cosmos ecosystem decentralized exchanges. It contains data on the orders, including the sender, receiver, tokens involved, and the order's status.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: The height of the block in which the transaction was included.

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp at which the block was created.

columns.name: tx_hash
columns.description: The unique hash of the transaction.

columns.name: tx_index
columns.description: The index of the transaction within the block.

columns.name: message_index
columns.description: The index of the message within the transaction.

columns.name: action_index
columns.description: The index of the action within the message.

columns.name: sender
columns.description: The address of the sender who placed the limit order.

columns.name: receiver
columns.description: The address of the receiver of the limit order.

columns.name: token_denom_in
columns.description: The denomination of the token being sold (input).

columns.name: token_amount_in_total
columns.description: The total amount of the token being sold (input).

columns.name: token_amount_in_executed
columns.description: The amount of the token that has been executed (sold).

columns.name: token_amount_in_remaining
columns.description: The amount of the token remaining in the order.

columns.name: token_denom_out
columns.description: The denomination of the token being bought (output).

columns.name: token_amount_out
columns.description: The amount of the token being bought (output).

columns.name: limit_tick
columns.description: The tick size for the limit order.

columns.name: order_type
columns.description: The type of the order (e.g. buy or sell).

columns.name: min_avg_sell_price
columns.description: The minimum average price at which the token can be sold.

columns.name: tranche_key
columns.description: The key of the tranche in which the limit order is placed.

columns.name: fee
columns.description: The fee associated with the limit order.

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp at which the data was ingested into the system.

tables.name: neutron_dex_limit_order_withdraw
tables.description: This table captures limit order withdrawals from decentralized exchanges in the Cosmos ecosystem, providing insights into the movement of assets within these networks. The data is sourced from blockchain transactions.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: The height of the block containing the transaction.

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp when the block containing the transaction was created.

columns.name: tx_hash
columns.description: A unique identifier for the transaction that triggered the limit order withdrawal.

columns.name: tx_index
columns.description: The index of the transaction within the block.

columns.name: message_index
columns.description: The index of the message within the transaction.

columns.name: action_index
columns.description: The index of the action within the message.

columns.name: sender
columns.description: The account that initiated the limit order withdrawal.

columns.name: receiver
columns.description: The account that received the withdrawn assets.

columns.name: token_denom_in
columns.description: The denomination of the token being withdrawn.

columns.name: token_amount_in_remaining
columns.description: The remaining amount of the token after the withdrawal.

columns.name: token_denom_out
columns.description: The denomination of the token being withdrawn to.

columns.name: token_amount_out
columns.description: The amount of the token withdrawn.

columns.name: tranche_key
columns.description: A unique identifier for the tranche associated with the limit order withdrawal.

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp when the transaction was ingested into the system.

tables.name: neutron_dex_lp_deposit
tables.description: Data related to liquidity pool (LP) deposits on decentralized exchanges (DEXs) within the Cosmos ecosystem, providing insights into the LP token minting process.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: The height of the block in which the transaction was confirmed.

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp at which the block was created.

columns.name: tx_hash
columns.description: The unique hash of the transaction.

columns.name: tx_index
columns.description: The index of the transaction in the block.

columns.name: message_index
columns.description: The index of the message within the transaction.

columns.name: action_index
columns.description: The index of the action within the message.

columns.name: sender
columns.description: The address of the account that initiated the transaction.

columns.name: receiver
columns.description: The address of the account that received the tokens.

columns.name: token_denom_0
columns.description: The denomination of the first token involved in the transaction.

columns.name: token_amount_0
columns.description: The amount of the first token transferred.

columns.name: token_denom_1
columns.description: The denomination of the second token involved in the transaction.

columns.name: token_amount_1
columns.description: The amount of the second token transferred.

columns.name: shares_minted
columns.description: The amount of LP tokens minted as a result of the deposit.

columns.name: tick_index
columns.description: The index of the tick within the liquidity pool.

columns.name: fee
columns.description: The fee associated with the transaction.

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp at which the data was ingested into the system.

tables.name: neutron_dex_lp_withdraw
tables.description: This table contains data related to liquidity pool withdrawals on decentralized exchanges within the Cosmos ecosystem. It captures key information about the withdrawal transactions, including the involved tokens and fees.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: The height of the block in which the withdrawal transaction was included.

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp of the block in which the withdrawal transaction was included.

columns.name: tx_hash
columns.description: The unique hash identifying the withdrawal transaction.

columns.name: tx_index
columns.description: The index of the withdrawal transaction within a batch of transactions.

columns.name: message_index
columns.description: The index of the withdrawal transaction message within a block.

columns.name: action_index
columns.description: The index of the withdrawal action within a transaction message.

columns.name: sender
columns.description: The address of the account that initiated the liquidity pool withdrawal.

columns.name: receiver
columns.description: The address of the account that received the withdrawn tokens.

columns.name: token_denom_0
columns.description: The denomination of the first token involved in the withdrawal.

columns.name: token_amount_0
columns.description: The amount of the first token withdrawn.

columns.name: token_denom_1
columns.description: The denomination of the second token involved in the withdrawal (if applicable).

columns.name: token_amount_1
columns.description: The amount of the second token withdrawn (if applicable).

columns.name: shares_burnt
columns.description: The amount of liquidity pool shares burnt as a result of the withdrawal.

columns.name: tick_index
columns.description: The tick index associated with the withdrawal (representing the token price).

columns.name: fee
columns.description: The fee associated with the withdrawal transaction.

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp when the withdrawal transaction data was ingested into the system.

tables.name: neutron_dex_swap
tables.description: This table captures data from decentralized exchanges on the Cosmos ecosystem, providing insights into token swap transactions. It contains key information about each swap, including token amounts and fees.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: The height of the block in which the swap transaction was included.

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp of the block in which the swap transaction was included.

columns.name: tx_hash
columns.description: The unique hash of the transaction that initiated the swap.

columns.name: tx_index
columns.description: The index of the transaction within the block.

columns.name: message_index
columns.description: The index of the message within the transaction.

columns.name: action_index
columns.description: The index of the action within the message.

columns.name: token_denom_0
columns.description: The denomination of the first token involved in the swap.

columns.name: token_denom_1
columns.description: The denomination of the second token involved in the swap.

columns.name: token_denom_in
columns.description: The denomination of the token being swapped in.

columns.name: reserves
columns.description: The amounts of each token involved in the swap.

columns.name: tick_index
columns.description: The index of the tick within the swap.

columns.name: tranche_key
columns.description: The key of the tranche within the swap.

columns.name: fee
columns.description: The fee paid for the swap transaction.

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp at which the data was ingested into the system.

tables.name: neutron_dex_tick_update
tables.description: This table contains detailed information about tick updates in the Cosmos ecosystem. It provides data on token reserves, fees, and other relevant metrics.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: The height of the block in which the tick update occurred.

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp of the block in which the tick update occurred.

columns.name: tx_hash
columns.description: The unique hash of the transaction that triggered the tick update.

columns.name: tx_index
columns.description: The index of the transaction in the block.

columns.name: message_index
columns.description: The index of the message in the transaction.

columns.name: action_index
columns.description: The index of the action in the message.

columns.name: token_denom_0
columns.description: The denomination of the first token involved in the tick update.

columns.name: token_denom_1
columns.description: The denomination of the second token involved in the tick update.

columns.name: token_denom_in
columns.description: The denomination of the token involved in the tick update.

columns.name: reserves
columns.description: The updated reserves of the token after the tick update.

columns.name: tick_index
columns.description: A unique identifier for the tick update.

columns.name: tranche_key
columns.description: A unique key for the tranche related to the tick update.

columns.name: fee
columns.description: The fee associated with the tick update.

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp when the data was ingested into the system.

tables.name: neutron_dex_tranche_user_update
tables.description: This table contains updates to specific tranches within a decentralized exchange (DEX) in the Cosmos ecosystem, capturing the dynamic changes in token holdings and share ownership.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: The height of the block in which the transaction was included.

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp at which the block was mined.

columns.name: tx_hash
columns.description: A unique identifier for the transaction.

columns.name: tx_index
columns.description: The index of the transaction within a block.

columns.name: message_index
columns.description: The index of the message within a transaction.

columns.name: action_index
columns.description: The index of the action within a message.

columns.name: sender
columns.description: The account address of the sender.

columns.name: token_denom_0
columns.description: The denomination of the first token involved in the transaction.

columns.name: token_denom_1
columns.description: The denomination of the second token involved in the transaction.

columns.name: token_denom_in
columns.description: The denomination of the token being transferred in.

columns.name: tick_index
columns.description: The index of the tick within the tranche.

columns.name: shares_owned
columns.description: The number of shares owned by the user within the tranche.

columns.name: shares_burnt
columns.description: The number of shares burnt by the user within the tranche.

columns.name: tranche_key
columns.description: A unique key identifying the tranche.

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp at which the data was ingested from the blockchain.

tables.name: neutron_ics20_receive
tables.description: This table captures information about ICS-20 receive transactions within the Cosmos ecosystem, providing insights into token transfer activities across the network. It includes key details about the transactions, such as sender and receiver addresses, token denominations, and transfer amounts.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: The height of the block in which the transaction was included.

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp when the block containing the transaction was created.

columns.name: tx_hash
columns.description: A unique identifier for the transaction, assigned by the blockchain.

columns.name: tx_index
columns.description: The index of the transaction within the block.

columns.name: message_index
columns.description: The index of the message within the transaction.

columns.name: action_index
columns.description: The index of the action within the message.

columns.name: sender
columns.description: The address of the account that initiated the transaction.

columns.name: receiver
columns.description: The address of the account that received the tokens.

columns.name: token_amount
columns.description: The amount of tokens transferred during the transaction.

columns.name: token_denom
columns.description: The denomination of the tokens transferred, typically a cosmos-native token.

columns.name: token_path
columns.description: A path representing the token transfer, including any intermediate denominations.

columns.name: memo
columns.description: A note or comment attached to the transaction by the sender.

columns.name: src_channel
columns.description: The source channel of the transaction.

columns.name: dst_channel
columns.description: The destination channel of the transaction.

columns.name: connection
columns.description: The connection identifier associated with the transaction.

columns.name: sequence
columns.description: The sequence number of the transaction within the channel.

columns.name: ack
columns.description: An acknowledgment flag indicating whether the transaction was successfully processed.

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp when the transaction data was ingested into the system.

tables.name: neutron_ics20_transfer
tables.description: This table contains information about ICS-20 transfers in the Cosmos ecosystem, providing insights into token transfers between different accounts and channels.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: The height of the block in which the transfer occurred.

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp of the block in which the transfer occurred.

columns.name: tx_hash
columns.description: The unique identifier of the transaction in which the transfer occurred.

columns.name: tx_index
columns.description: The index of the transfer within the transaction.

columns.name: message_index
columns.description: The index of the message in which the transfer occurred.

columns.name: action_index
columns.description: The index of the action within the message in which the transfer occurred.

columns.name: sender
columns.description: The account that initiated the transfer.

columns.name: receiver
columns.description: The account that received the transfer.

columns.name: token_amount
columns.description: The amount of tokens transferred.

columns.name: token_denom
columns.description: The denomination of the token transferred.

columns.name: token_path
columns.description: The path of the token transfer, including any intermediary channels.

columns.name: memo
columns.description: Any additional information provided with the transfer.

columns.name: src_channel
columns.description: The source channel of the transfer.

columns.name: dst_channel
columns.description: The destination channel of the transfer.

columns.name: connection
columns.description: The connection through which the transfer occurred.

columns.name: sequence
columns.description: The sequence number of the transfer, used for ordering and consistency.

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp at which the transfer data was ingested into the database.

tables.name: neutron_message_events
tables.description: This table contains events from blockchains within the Cosmos ecosystem, providing insights into network activity and behavior.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: The height of the block in which the event was recorded.

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp when the block was created.

columns.name: tx_hash
columns.description: A unique identifier for the transaction containing the event.

columns.name: tx_index
columns.description: The index of the transaction within the block.

columns.name: message_index
columns.description: The index of the message within the transaction.

columns.name: event_index
columns.description: The index of the event within the message.

columns.name: event_type
columns.description: The category or type of event that occurred.

columns.name: event_attributes
columns.description: Additional information about the event, such as sender, recipient, or amount transferred.

columns.name: schema_version
columns.description: The version of the schema used to ingest the data.

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp when the data was ingested into the system.

tables.name: neutron_redelegate
tables.description: This table contains information about redelegations in the Cosmos ecosystem. It lists all redelegations made across different validators, including the source and destination validators, as well as the amount of tokens redelegated.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: Height of the block in which the redelegation transaction occurred.

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: Timestamp of the block in which the redelegation transaction occurred.

columns.name: tx_hash
columns.description: Hash of the transaction that initiated the redelegation.

columns.name: tx_index
columns.description: Index of the transaction within the block.

columns.name: message_index
columns.description: Index of the message within the transaction.

columns.name: action_index
columns.description: Index of the action within the message.

columns.name: sender
columns.description: Address of the validator that initiated the redelegation.

columns.name: src_validator
columns.description: Address of the validator from which tokens were redelegated.

columns.name: dst_validator
columns.description: Address of the validator to which tokens were redelegated.

columns.name: token_amount
columns.description: Amount of tokens redelegated.

columns.name: token_denom
columns.description: Denomination of the tokens redelegated.

columns.name: completion_time
columns.description: Timestamp when the redelegation was completed.

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: Timestamp when the redelegation data was ingested into the database.

tables.name: neutron_send
tables.description: Cosmos Block Data: This table contains data from various blockchains within the Cosmos ecosystem, providing insights into transactions and token movements. It serves as a comprehensive dataset for analyzing the activity and dynamics of the Cosmos network.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: The unique identifier for a block in the blockchain, representing its position in the chain.

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp when the block was created, indicating when the transactions within the block were processed.

columns.name: tx_hash
columns.description: A unique identifier for a transaction, allowing for the tracking of its movement through the blockchain.

columns.name: tx_index
columns.description: The index of the transaction within a block, providing a specific position within the block's transaction list.

columns.name: message_index
columns.description: The index of the message within a transaction, indicating its position within the transaction's message list.

columns.name: action_index
columns.description: The index of the action within a message, indicating its position within the message's action list.

columns.name: sender
columns.description: The address of the account that initiated a transaction, responsible for sending tokens or executing actions.

columns.name: receiver
columns.description: The address of the account that received tokens or executed actions as a result of a transaction.

columns.name: token_amount
columns.description: The quantity of tokens involved in a transaction, representing the change in token balance.

columns.name: token_denom
columns.description: The denomination of the tokens involved in a transaction, specifying the unit of the token.

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp when the data was ingested into the database, indicating when the information became available.

tables.name: neutron_transactions
tables.description: Cosmos Ecosystem Blockchain Transactions. This table contains information about all transactions occurring across various chains in the Cosmos ecosystem.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: The block height at which the transaction was processed.

columns.name: chain_id
columns.description: The ID of the blockchain on which the transaction occurred.

columns.name: tx_id
columns.description: A unique identifier for the transaction.

columns.name: tx_info
columns.description: Additional information about the transaction.

columns.name: tx_log_message
columns.description: A log message related to the transaction.

columns.name: memo
columns.description: A memo or note associated with the transaction.

columns.name: fee
columns.description: The fee paid for the transaction.

columns.name: tx_code
columns.description: The transaction code or result.

columns.name: tx_index
columns.description: The index of the transaction within a block.

columns.name: gas_used
columns.description: The amount of gas used during the transaction.

columns.name: gas_wanted
columns.description: The amount of gas requested for the transaction.

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp at which the transaction was ingested.

columns.name: schema_version
columns.description: The version of the schema used to process the transaction.

columns.name: fee_coins
columns.description: The coins used to pay the transaction fee.

columns.name: fee_granter
columns.description: The account that granted the transaction fee.

columns.name: fee_payer
columns.description: The account that paid the transaction fee.

columns.name: gas_limit
columns.description: The maximum amount of gas the transaction was allowed to use.

columns.name: single_sign_mode
columns.description: Whether the transaction was processed in single sign mode.

columns.name: multi_sign_json
columns.description: JSON data related to multi- sign transactions.

columns.name: timeout_height
columns.description: The block height at which the transaction was timed out.

tables.name: neutron_tx_messages
tables.description: This table contains a collection of transactions from various blockchains within the Cosmos ecosystem, providing insights into the blockchain activity over time.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: The height of the block in which the transaction was included.

columns.name: chain_id
columns.description: The unique identifier of the blockchain on which the transaction occurred.

columns.name: tx_id
columns.description: The unique identifier of the transaction.

columns.name: tx_index
columns.description: The index of the transaction within the block.

columns.name: message_index
columns.description: The index of the message within the transaction.

columns.name: message_type
columns.description: The type of message within the transaction.

columns.name: message
columns.description: The actual message within the transaction.

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp when the transaction data was ingested into the database.

columns.name: schema_version
columns.description: The version of the schema used to store the transaction data.

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp when the block was created, which includes the transaction.

tables.name: neutron_undelegate
tables.description: This table provides a detailed view of undelegation events on Cosmos chain, offering insights into validator redelegation and token movement.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: The height of the block where the undelegation event occurred.

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp of the block where the undelegation event occurred.

columns.name: tx_hash
columns.description: The unique hash of the transaction containing the undelegation event.

columns.name: tx_index
columns.description: The index of the transaction containing the undelegation event within the block.

columns.name: message_index
columns.description: The index of the message containing the undelegation event within the transaction.

columns.name: action_index
columns.description: The index of the action containing the undelegation event within the message.

columns.name: sender
columns.description: The account that initiated the undelegation event.

columns.name: validator
columns.description: The validator that was redelegated from by the undelegation event.

columns.name: token_amount
columns.description: The amount of tokens redelegated from the validator.

columns.name: token_denom
columns.description: The denomination of the tokens redelegated from the validator.

columns.name: completion_time
columns.description: The time at which the undelegation event is expected to be completed.

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp when this data was ingested into the system.

tables.name: neutron_vote
tables.description: This table contains voting data from the Cosmos ecosystem, providing insights into proposals and their outcomes. It includes details about the voting process and the entities involved.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: The height of the block in which the vote was recorded, indicating the chronological order of votes.

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp of the block in which the vote was recorded, showing when the vote was processed.

columns.name: tx_hash
columns.description: A unique identifier for the transaction that contains the vote, allowing for tracking of vote- related activities.

columns.name: tx_index
columns.description: The index of the transaction within a block, providing a way to identify and track transactions.

columns.name: message_index
columns.description: The index of the message within a transaction, enabling the identification of specific votes.

columns.name: action_index
columns.description: The index of the action within a message, facilitating the isolation of vote-related actions.

columns.name: sender
columns.description: The entity that initiated the vote, such as a validator or a user, indicating who is responsible for the vote.

columns.name: proposal_id
columns.description: A unique identifier for the proposal being voted on, enabling tracking of proposal-related activities.

columns.name: option
columns.description: The specific option or choice made by the sender in the vote, indicating their preference or stance.

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp when the vote data was ingested into the system, providing an audit trail for data processing.

tables.name: neutron_wasm_contract_labels
tables.description: This table contains labels for WASM contract events from the Cosmos ecosystem, providing insights into the actions and transactions performed on these contracts. It includes metadata such as block height, timestamp, and contract address.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: The block height at which the contract event occurred.

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp of the block at which the contract event occurred.

columns.name: tx_hash
columns.description: The unique hash of the transaction that triggered the contract event.

columns.name: tx_index
columns.description: The index of the transaction within the block that triggered the contract event.

columns.name: message_index
columns.description: The index of the message within the block that triggered the contract event.

columns.name: action_index
columns.description: The index of the action within the message that triggered the contract event.

columns.name: contract_address
columns.description: The address of the WASM contract that triggered the event.

columns.name: action
columns.description: A description of the action performed on the WASM contract.

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp when the contract event data was ingested into the system.

tables.name: neutron_wasm_executed_actions
tables.description: This table contains executed actions from the Cosmos ecosystem, providing insights into the activities and transactions that have taken place on the blockchain. It includes details about the block, transaction, and action that were executed.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: The height of the block in which the action was executed.

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp of the block in which the action was executed.

columns.name: tx_hash
columns.description: The unique hash of the transaction that contained the action.

columns.name: tx_index
columns.description: The index of the transaction in the block.

columns.name: message_index
columns.description: The index of the message in the transaction.

columns.name: action_index
columns.description: The index of the action in the message.

columns.name: contract_address
columns.description: The address of the smart contract that the action was executed on.

columns.name: action
columns.description: A description of the action that was executed, such as a function call or message.

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp when the action data was ingested into the database.
